DOC.brief_summary: This study verify short-term efficacy long-term prognosis thulium laser resection compare conventional transurethral resection non-muscular invasive bladder cancer . Half participant receive thulium laser resection bladder cancer , half receive electrical transurethral resection bladder cancer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Effects Thulium Laser en Bloc Resection Electrical Transurethral Resection Non-muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
